name: Projector Control Panel : OPT-PS3H
description:
PROJECTOR CONTROL PANEL

Specifications
INPUT
: 3 x VGA ( D-Sub 15 Pin Female )
: 1 x HDMI
: 3 x 3.5mm Audio Mini Jack
: 1 x Composite Video ( RCA )
: 1 x Stereo / Composite Audio ( RCA )
: 1 x 6.35mm Microphone In Jack
: 1 x 12V DC Power

OUTPUT
: 2 x VGA ( To Projector and Monitor )
: 1 x HDMI ( To Projector )
: 1 x Video ( To Projector)
: 1 x Audio ( To Active Speaker )
: 1 x Audio (Extra )
: 1 x USB ( To Interactive Projector )

Stock Available. Please call OPTVIO to ask for Quote.

(+65) 6684 9668

 Features

• Display Controller for your Projector. Control POWER ON/OFF, 4 x Input Source selection, Volume Control through RS232 Commands.
• 3 x VGA Input Selection
• 1 x HDMI Input Selection
• Supported resolution up to 1920 x 1200 for HDMI
• Bandwidth up to 350MHz
• Pre-programmed control protocols for different Projectors Model
• Digital volume control for sound level (for both Microphone and Audio Source
• Small and Elegant ( L: 148mm x W: 85mm x H: 52mm)
• Comes with DC12V / 1A adapter
short_description:
PROJECTOR CONTROL PANEL

• 3 x VGA input selection, 1 HDMI input selection
• Supported resolution 1920 x 1200 for HDMI
• Small and Elegant ( L: 148mm x W: 85mm x H: 52mm)
• Comes with DC12V / 1A adapter

name: USB CAT5E EXTENDER 30M - E-USB/UE150
description:
USB CAT5E EXTENDER 30M

USB CAT5E Extender 30M (OPT-USB-CAT5E) is powerful but yet simple to use. It works with any devices with USB connection (except portable hard disk). This cable DO NOT requires driver / software, it is purely plug and play.

Tested and work well with various brand of Interactive Whiteboard / Interactive Projector, that require long USB connection during installation. It can achieve a total length of 30 Meter.

Compatible with USB 1.0,1.1, and 2.0 devices.

  • Allows connection between PC and USB devices up to 30M

  • Works effectively with various USB devices

  • Fully compatible with USB 1.0, 1.1 and USB 2.0

  • Works well with Interactive White Board (IWB)

  • Easy to use and install

  • Plug and play without software required


*Comes with 12 months warranty
short_description:
USB CAT5E EXTENDER 30M

• Use Cat5E cabling to extend your USB peripherals up to 30 Meter
• Fully compatible with USB 1.0, 1.1 and USB 2.0
• Easy to install
• Plug and play without software required

name: 5 CORE VGA CABLE: OPT-VGA-5C
description:
5 CORE VGA CABLE

Suitable for use as connection/interconnection cable for computer and display. It is ideal for high resolution display such as projector, LCD Flat Panel, or Monitor.

Mainly use for conference room, auditoriums, home theater, performance stage, and etc.

It can also be use for long distance VGA signal transfer application. SVGA signal can be transmitted over 60 meters with low losses. The high percentage shielding offers interference-free signal transfer.

Specification

• OD 10.5 (Outer Diameter)
• Used for connection between PC and Projector
• Fine strands of copper result good connectivity
• 75-ohm impedance
• Suitable for long distance VGA signal transfer application

Pricing is based on per 100 Meter/ Drum.
short_description:
5 CORE VGA CABLE

Pricing is based on per 100 Meter/ Drum.

• OD 10.5 (Outer Diameter)
• Used for connection between PC and Projector
• Fine strands of copper result good connectivity
• 75-ohm impedance
• Suitable for long distance VGA signal transfer application

name: 3 IN 1 MULTI-CORE CABLE: OPT-3IN1-15M
description:
3 IN 1 MULTI-CORE CABLE

OPTVIO 3 in 1 multi-core cable is specially design for OPTVIO's Integrated Control Switches (PS3). It is used as connection cable for projector and Integrated Control Switches (PS3). It comes with single end mouled connector (VGA, RCA Video, 9pin RS232) for the projector. The other end comes with connectors for the PS3, thus user can simply plug and play (No Soldering Required).

It is ideal for high resolution display such as projector, LCD Flat Panel, or Monitor.

Mainly use for conference room, classroom, training room , and etc.

It can also be use for long distance VGA signal transfer application with low losses up to 15 / 20 Meters.. The high percentage shielding offers interference-free signal transfer.

Specification

• OD 10.0 (Outer Diameter)
• Used for connection between PC and Projector
• Fine strands of copper result good connectivity
• 75-ohm impedance
• Suitable for long distance VGA signal transfer application

Pricing is based on 15 Meter Per Piece.
short_description:
3 IN 1 MULTI-CORE CABLE

Pricing is based on 15 Meter Per Piece.

• OD 10.0 (Outer Diameter)
• Used for connection between PC and Projector
• Fine strands of copper result good connectivity

name: HDMI 18GBPS Audio Extractor - OPT-MB01
description:
HDMI 18GBPS Audio Extractor

  • HDMI 18GBPS Audio Extractor is of high bandwidth and supports the latest HDMI 2.0 specifications

  • De-embed HDMI audio streams from any HDMI based device to digital or analog stereo

  • Maintain 4K/60 video resolutions and pass-thru for HDR 10 (High Dynamic Range)

  • Select bit-stream

  • Supports Different Audio Formats including LCPM 2-channel stereo, Dolby True HD, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Atmos and DTS-HD Master audio

  • Audio sampling rate up to 192kHz

  • Supports uncompressed audio such as LPCM. by switching instantly

  • Plug and play

  • Converts 2CH from 24-bit up to 192 kHz audio 

  • Compatible with various devices such as Apple TV 4th generation, Google Chromecast, Xbox One, PS4, Sonos Speaker systems


* Comes with 12 months warranty
